resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157449</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157449</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2778</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Time Capsule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeit-Kapsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Capsule de Temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Cápsula Do Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Capsula Di Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρονική κάψα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Cápsula Del Tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A teacher guide to a writing activity wherestudents choose one item that reflects their life and that they would like to include in a time capsuleand explain why they chose it. Includes actual examples..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Lehreranleitung eine zu den Schreiben 
Aktivität wherestudents wählen ein Einzelteil, das ihre Lebensdauer 
reflektiert und erklären die sie in einem Zeit capsuleand 
einschließen möchten, warum sie es wählten. Schließt 
tatsächliche Beispiele ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un guide de professeur des wherestudents d'une 
activité d'écriture choisissent un élément qui reflète leur vie 
et qu'ils voudraient inclure dans un capsuleand de temps expliquent 
pourquoi ils l'ont choisi. Inclut des exemples réels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma guia do professor aos wherestudents de uma 
atividade da escrita escolhe um artigo que reflete sua vida e que 
gostariam de incluir em um capsuleand do tempo explicam porque o 
escolheram. Inclui exemplos reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una guida dell'insegnante ai wherestudents di 
attività di scrittura sceglie un articolo che riflette la loro vita e
che vorrebbero includere in un capsuleand di tempo spiegano perchè lo
hanno scelto. Include gli esempi reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας οδηγός δασκάλων για μια δραστηριότητα γραψίματος
wherestudents επιλέγει ένα αντικείμενο που απεικονίζει τη ζωή 
τους και που θα επιθυμούσαν να περιλάβουν σε έναν χρόνο 
capsuleand εξηγούν γιατί το επέλεξαν. Περιλαμβάνει τα 
πραγματικά παραδείγματα ..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía del profesor a los wherestudents de una
actividad de la escritura elige un item que refleje su vida y que 
quisieran incluir en un capsuleand del tiempo expliquen porqué lo 
eligieron. Incluye ejemplos reales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
